name: Dalgona Candy Honeycomb Cookie
description: Test your patience and precision by carving intricate patterns into honeycomb candy without breaking it. Inspired by the viral Squid Game challenge.
howToPlay: Use your mouse or touch to carefully trace the pattern on the honeycomb candy. Move slowly and precisely to avoid breaking the candy. Complete the pattern within the time limit to win.
features: Multiple difficulty levels, various patterns to choose from, time challenges, and realistic physics.
iframe: <iframe src="https://www.crazygames.com/embed/dalgona-candy" class="game-iframe" title="Dalgona Candy Game" allow="fullscreen" frameborder="0"></iframe>

name: Bubble Shooter Classic
description: Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop them and clear the board. A classic arcade game that's easy to learn but hard to master.
howToPlay: Aim and shoot bubbles to match 3 or more of the same color. Clear all bubbles to advance to the next level.
features: 100+ levels, power-ups, special bubbles, and leaderboards.
iframe: <iframe src="https://www.example.com/embed/bubble-shooter" class="game-iframe" title="Bubble Shooter Game" allow="fullscreen" frameborder="0"></iframe>

name: Space Invaders Reloaded
description: Defend Earth from waves of alien invaders in this modern remake of the classic arcade game.
howToPlay: Use arrow keys to move and spacebar to shoot. Destroy all aliens before they reach the bottom of the screen.
features: Modern graphics, power-ups, boss battles, and multiple difficulty levels.

name: Sweet Candy Match
description: Match candies in this sweet puzzle game. Create combos to unlock special candies and power-ups.
howToPlay: Swap adjacent candies to create matches of 3 or more. Complete level objectives to advance.
features: Hundreds of levels, special candies, boosters, and daily challenges.

name: Racing Fever 3D
description: Experience high-speed racing action with realistic physics and stunning 3D graphics.
howToPlay: Use arrow keys or WASD to control your car. Compete against AI or other players online.
features: 20+ tracks, 30+ cars, multiplayer mode, car customization, and realistic physics.
